user_query: I'm planning a surprise birthday party for my best friend. Can you suggest some fun party games that we can play? Also, find me a list of local bakeries that offer custom birthday cakes. Additionally, I need to send out invitations to the party. Provide me with a short URL for the online invitation.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of fun party games suitable for a birthday celebration.
Find local bakeries that offer custom birthday cakes and compile a list.
Create an online invitation for the birthday party including the date, time, and location.
Generate a short URL for the online invitation created in step 3.
